input.sentences: i was loved the basketball tournament !
each of us had a temporary tattoo painted on our hands !
those cartoons the artist drew of us were hilarious .

output.sentences: The school is having a fun event.
The nice girl is getting something signed at the event.
A cartoonist draws a picture of a girl at the event.
A boy tries to win something using a wheel at the event.
